response.original_title: Fusion's Snoop Dogg Roast Snoop Dogg Smokeout
response.overview: Fusion & All Def Digital presents the Roast of smoking superstar Snoop Dogg, a hilariously, hip-hop twist on the classic comedy Roast format. Hosted by Mike Epps with an all-star panel of roasters, including T.I., Terry Crews, French Montana and more.
response.title: Fusion's Snoop Dogg Roast Snoop Dogg Smokeout
